Job Description:

Manage and supervise the Piping Engineering work independently, good understanding of P&ID and be able to develop piping arrangement according to P&ID
Perform works in accordance with Company Procedures, standards, specifications and any project regulations
Undertake site coordination work at requirement.
Arrange for the preparation of piping design deliverables including Layout drawings, specifications, detail drawings, schedules, and diagrams to enable project activities to take place smoothly
Provide technical support to the project construction team at requirement including but not limited to bids evaluation, definition of the scope of work, technical requirements and etc.
Maintain good interface with other disciplines
Qualifications:

Minimum 10 years piping engineering experience in chemical & petrochemical projects
Minimum 5 years exposure to international projects
Experience in international engineering company or CDI is a plus
Good understanding of international and local codes, standards, regulations
Discipline related design ability (BE, DE), piping layout and materials selection
Good command of engineering and project management tools
Good English communication skill
Experience on technical support at construction site
Discipline related Bachelor Degree in engineering
Engineering Certificate Secondary Level or above preferred
